languages.text: "Радость — тленное чувство. Не прельщайся им, Вольный Торговец. Помни о долге и укрепись мыслью о нем".

traits.locale_text: "Радость — тленное чувство. Не прельщайся им, Вольный Торговец. Помни о долге и укрепись мыслью о нем".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Gladness is fleeting. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."
languages.original_text: "Радость — тленное чувство. Не прельщайся им, Вольный Торговец. Помни о долге и укрепись мыслью о нем".

traits.locale_text: "Gladness is perishable. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Gladness is perishable. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Gladness is fleeting. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Gladness is fleeting. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Gladness is fleeting. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “高兴与快乐转瞬即逝。别被它诱惑，行商浪人。只需想着你的使命，这样你便永远不会动摇。”
languages.original_text: "Gladness is fleeting. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."

traits.locale_text: “高兴与快乐转瞬即逝。别被它诱惑，行商浪人。只需想着你的使命，这样你便永远不会动摇。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La alegría es efímera. No se deje tentar por ella, Comerciante Independiente. Piense tan solo en su deber y deje que eso l{mf|e|a} aliente».
languages.original_text: "Gladness is fleeting. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."

traits.locale_text: «La alegría es efímera. No se deje tentar por ella, Comerciante Independiente. Piense tan solo en su deber y deje que eso l{mf|e|a} aliente».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「喜びは儚いものだ。自由開拓者よ、惑わされてはならない。己の使命だけを考え、それによって勇気を抱くのだ」
languages.original_text: "Gladness is fleeting. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."

traits.locale_text: 「喜びは儚いものだ。自由開拓者よ、惑わされてはならない。己の使命だけを考え、それによって勇気を抱くのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Freude ist flüchtig. Lasst Euch nicht davon ködern, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Denkt nur an Eure Bestimmung, und lasst Euch von ihr stärken."
languages.original_text: "Gladness is fleeting. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."

traits.locale_text: "Freude ist flüchtig. Lasst Euch nicht davon ködern, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Denkt nur an Eure Bestimmung, und lasst Euch von ihr stärken."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Le bonheur est une sensation fugace. Ne cédez pas à ses sirènes, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ne songez qu'à votre vocation sacrée, pour qu'elle vous donne force et courage. »
languages.original_text: "Gladness is fleeting. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."

traits.locale_text: « Le bonheur est une sensation fugace. Ne cédez pas à ses sirènes, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ne songez qu'à votre vocation sacrée, pour qu'elle vous donne force et courage. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Mutluluk geçicidir. Gözlerinin önüne perde çekmesine izin verme Hür Tacir. Yalnızca görevini düşün ve ondan güç al."
languages.original_text: "Gladness is fleeting. Do not be enticed by it, Rogue Trader. Think only of your calling and be emboldened by it."
